name: Physics Shapes
description:
Play with shapes on your desktop background any time you're bored!

Draw cubes, spheres or pyramids of any size or colour! Watch them fall and collide, remove gravity, push them and pin them to make fun physics toys out of them!

This game can be played standalone but also is suitable (and designed ) for WallpaperEngine:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/431960/Wallpaper_Engine/
